user_story.as_a: As the founder of a new co-op
user_story.i_want: appoint the initial directors and officers
user_story.so_that: make our new co-op have the necessary directors and officers

whens_list: I go to the Directors page
I choose a member from the list
thens_list: I should see that member in the list of directors
that member should receive a notification of their new directorship

whens_list: I go to the Directors page
I choose a director from the list of directors
I choose 'Secretary' from the list of offices
thens_list: I should see that director listed as "Secretary" in the list of Officers
that member should receive a notification of their new office
